Ahri.name: Ahri
Ahri.title: the Nine-Tailed Fox
Ahri.blurb: A cunning mage who lures and charms her opponents.
Ahri.passive: Essence Theft: Gaining stacks from abilities heals Ahri when she reaches nine charges.

spells.name: Orb of Deception
spells.description: Deals 40/65/90/115/140 (+35% AP) magic damage outbound and true damage on return.

spells.name: Fox-Fire
spells.description: Releases flames that seek nearby enemies for 40/65/90/115/140 (+30% AP) damage.

spells.name: Charm
spells.description: Charms an enemy dealing 60/95/130/165/200 (+60% AP) magic damage.

spells.name: Spirit Rush
spells.description: Dashes forward and fires essence bolts dealing 60/90/120 (+35% AP) damage per bolt.

Yasuo.name: Yasuo
Yasuo.title: the Unforgiven
Yasuo.blurb: A mobile fighter who chases down targets with swift strikes.
Yasuo.passive: Way of the Wanderer: Critical strike chance is doubled but damage is reduced.

spells.name: Steel Tempest
spells.description: Thrusts forward dealing 20/45/70/95/120 (+100% AD) physical damage.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Creates a wall that blocks enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Sweeping Blade
spells.description: Dashes through an enemy dealing 70/90/110/130/150 (+60% AP) magic damage.

spells.name: Last Breath
spells.description: Blinks to airborne enemies dealing 200/300/400 (+150% bonus AD) physical damage.
